seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the generated image. Only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the generated image. Only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16.

lora_scale.title: Lora Scale
lora_scale.description: Determines how strongly the main LoRA should be applied. 0.5 usually works well for most LoRAs.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image.

hf_api_token.title: Hf Api Token
hf_api_token.description: HuggingFace API token. If you're using a HuggingFace LoRAs that needs authentication, you'll need to provide an API token.

lora_weights.title: Lora Weights
lora_weights.description: Load LoRA weights. Supports HuggingFace URLs in the format huggingface.co/<owner>/<model-name>[/<lora-weights-file.safetensors>]. HuggingFace LoRAs may require an API token to access, which you can provide in the `hf_api_token` input.

prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling
prompt_upsampling.description: Upsample the prompt with an LLM.

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.
